description: Object type for type=adaptor adaptor_type=ldap conf entries.

bindParameters.description: Bind parameters for this LDAP adaptor.
bindParameters.label: Bind Parameters

preventVerifyCert.description: Specify true to prevent the ldap server certificate from being verified when url uses the LDAPS scheme. If this parameter is false or not specified, the adaptor does not influence the decision to verify the server certificate.
preventVerifyCert.label: Prevent Verify Cert

url.description: URL of LDAP Server. For example, ldaps://ldap-server:636
url.label: Url
